item.title: Materialize: Querying JSON files
item.description: I recently learnt about Materialize, a SQL streaming database, via their Series B fundraising announcement, and thought I’d take it for a spin. My go-to dataset for new databases is Strava, an app that I use to record my runs. It has an API that returns a JSON representation of each run, containing information like the distance covered, elapsed time, heart rate metrics, and more. I’ve extracted my latest 30 activities to a file in the JSON lines format and in this post we’re going to analyse that data using Materialize.
